en: Extend your legs fully now.
Bend your knees slightly.

ru: Сохраняя спину прямой, кистями возьмитесь за внешние стороны стоп, либо за большие пальцы.
en: Keeping your back straight, grasp the outer edges of your feet or your big toes with your hands.

ru: При необходимости используйте ремень или блок.
en: If needed, make use of a strap.

ru: Задняя поверхность шеи - продолжение прямой вытянутой спины.
en: Keep the back of your neck aligned with your straightened spine, forming one continuous line.
Paschimottanasana with a straight back.

ru: Наклон вперед из положения сидя с прямой спиной.
en: Forward bend from a seated position with a straight back.
Maintain a straight spine whilst extending through your legs.

ru: Если спина скругляется, оставьте ноги подсогнутыми.
en: If your spine begins to bow, keep a slight bend in your knees.
Both legs are fully relaxed.

ru: Животом тянитесь вперед, чтобы поддерживать прямую спину и прогиб в пояснице.
en: Reach forward with your belly to maintain a straight back and an arch in your lower spine.
Lower back and back are straightened.

ru: Теперь скруглите спину и потянитесь грудной клеткой вперед и вниз.
en: Round your back as you stretch your chest forward and downward.
Paschimottanasana with a rounded spine.

ru: Наклон вперед из положения сидя со скругленной спиной.
en: Sit in a forward fold with a rounded spine.
Bend your knees slightly.
Straighten your torso.
Rotate the shoulder joints backward.
Clasp your hands in a lock beneath your knees.
Arch your lower back.
Draw the shoulder blades toward each other.

ru: Поднимите голени и выведите в горизонтальную плоскость.
en: Lift your shins and bring them into a horizontal position.

ru: Кисти выведите в горизонтальную плоскость вместе с голенями.
en: Bring your hands into a horizontal plane alongside your shins.
Rotate the shoulder joints backward.
Direct your gaze straight ahead.
Navasana.
Boat Pose.
Intermediate variation.
Direct your attention to the point of tension.
Breathe deeply.

ru: Руки в замок под колени, поясницу прижмите к поверхности
en: Clasp your hands under your knees and press your lower back to the surface.

ru: Вытяните ноги на 45 градусов от поверхности.
en: Extend your legs outward at a precise 45-degree angle from the surface.
Point your toes.
Extend your arms fully, lengthening them with graceful intention and awareness.
+Ardha Navasana.
Half Boat Pose.
Direct your attention to the abdominal area.
Clasp your hands in a lock beneath your knees.
Lower your lower back and shoulder blades down toward the floor.
Pull your toes towards you.

ru: Рёбра ладоней поместите в основание черепа.
en: Place the ribs of the palms of the hands at the foundation of the skull.

ru: Лбом и локтями тянитесь к коленям.
en: Reach towards your knees with your forehead and elbows.
ensure that your shoulder blades are gracefully lifted off the mat, so they hover just above it.
Direct your attention to the abdominal area.
Clasp your hands in a lock beneath your knees.

ru: Локти поставьте назад под плечевые суставы.
en: Position your elbows back beneath your shoulder joints.
Round your lower back.

ru: Поясницу тяните вниз, локти отводя назад.
en: Draw your lower back downwards whilst simultaneously extending your elbows backwards.

ru: Вытяните ноги на 45 градусов от поверхности.
en: Extend your legs outward at a precise 45-degree angle from the surface.
Keep your knees straight.

ru: Носками выводите цифры от нуля до девяти.
en: Draw numbers from zero to nine with your toes.
Shift the attention to the face muscles.
As you ready perform folds.

ru: Кисти поместите под поясницу и поднимите таз.
en: Place your wrists beneath your lower back and lift your pelvis upward.
Extend your legs vertically upwards.
Viparita Karani.
Shoulder Stand Pose.
Arch your lower back.
Pull your toes towards you.
Observe your breath.
Bend your knees slightly.

ru: Вытяните руки вдоль коврика, сцепите кисти в замок и разверните кисти от себя.
en: Extend your arms along the mat, clasp your hands together, and rotate your palms outward.

ru: Прогнитесь в грудном и поясничном отделах позвоночника.
en: Arch your upper and lower back.

ru: Ноги вытяните за голову, сохраняя поясницу прямой.
en: Lift your legs over your head while keeping your lower back flat.
Halasana
The Plough Pose
Your back and lower back are straight.
Bend your knees slightly.
Rest your weight on your elbows.
Lower your lower back to release pressure from your spine.
Use a blanket if needed.
Lower your elbows.
Relax the soles of your feet, allowing them to soften and release tension.
Relax your knees.
Relax tension in your hip cradle, letting the weight of gravity soften your pelvic bowl.
Lie down in a comfortable position.
Turn your palms to face upward.
Lengthen your lower back.

ru: Вытяните грудной и шейный отделы позвоночника.
en: Extend your chest and neck, extending and lifting the spine fully.
Savasana.
Corpse Pose.
The session is over.
You have reached the finish.
